content: choice join to work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place stitch marker to mark the bor 2 ribbing k1 p2 k2 p2 until last stitch k1 work in rib as established for a total of 12 rounds 3 leg change colour if desired and begin working the chart for your selected leg option using the chart or written instructions below the charts are read starting at the bottom right and from right to left the charts are 12 stitches wide and the stitches indicated in red are repeated 5 6 7 8 times so the pattern is worked across the front 28 32 36 40 stitches only ©2025 by samantha west all rights reserved 3 written instructions leg option a using contrast colour 1 rounds 1 2 4 6 8 & 10 knit to end round 3 yo ssk k2 x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 5 k1 yo ssk k2 x 6 7 8 9 yo ssk knit to end round 7 k2 yo ssk x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 9 k1 k2 yo ssk x 6 7 8 9 kknit to end using contrast colour 2 rounds 11 12 14 16 18 & 20 knit to end round 13 k2 k2tog yo x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 15 k1 k2tog yo k2 x 6 7 8 9 k2tog yo knit to end round 17 k2tog yo k2 x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 19 k3 k2tog yo k2 x 6 7 8 9 knit to end chart a ©2025 by samantha west all rights reserved 4 written instructions leg option b left sock rounds 1 3 5 & 7 knit to end round 2 yo ssk k2 x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 4 k1 yo ssk k2 x 6 7 8 9 yo ssk knit to end round 6 k2 yo ssk x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 8 k1 k2 yo ssk x 6 7 8 9 knit to end chart b left sock written instructions leg option b right sock rounds 1 3 5 & 7 knit to end round 2 k2 k2tog yo x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 4 k1 k2tog yo k2 x 6 7 8 9 k2tog yo knit to end round 6 k2tog yo k2 x 7 8 9 10 knit to end round 8 k3 k2tog yo k2 x 6 7 8 9 knit to end ©2025 by samantha west all rights reserved 5 chart b right leg 4 leg continued leg option a continue working rounds 1 to 20 changing contrast colours 1 and 2 as d esired until the leg is the desired length the sample ended after round 10 of the 1st chart repetition leg option b c ontinue working rounds 1 to 8 until the leg is the desired length 5 heel flap change colour if desired
